content.raw: updated in 8df42bef274a
#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/469/merging-atlasplugin-and-atlasv3plugin/diff#comment-3276416
which message should I update?

*The testing run shows a failure The current result shows a failure on linking http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/64/console_*

**Update**: I just modify the script to pass `ATLAS_SIMINTERFACE_1_BINARY_EXISTS:BOOL=False` to the build, and the compilation ends fine on i386. We just need to update the message in the building system.

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/65/console
content.html:
The testing run shows a failure The current result shows a failure on linking http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/64/console_

Update: I just modify the script to pass ATLAS_SIMINTERFACE_1_BINARY_EXISTS:BOOL=False to the build, and the compilation ends fine on i386. We just need to update the message in the building system.

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/65/console

content.raw: We need to update this message to set the proper variable `ATLAS_SIMINTERFACE_1_BINARY_EXISTS`
content.html: We need to update this message to set the proper variable ATLAS_SIMINTERFACE_1_BINARY_EXISTS

content.raw: p.s. the variable is now `ATLAS_SIMINTERFACE_1_BINARY_EXISTS`
nice, thanks!

After thinking twice on how to test this, I've modified the any script to allow ARCH parameter, I think is the best way and easiest for testing this stuff.

This is the first run, I would say that the fail is expected due to missing `-DUSE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB:BOOL=False`:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/54/console

I will modify the script to pass that variable to the test on i386.
content.html:
After thinking twice on how to test this, I've modified the any script to allow ARCH parameter, I think is the best way and easiest for testing this stuff.

This is the first run, I would say that the fail is expected due to missing -DUSE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB:BOOL=False: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/54/console

I will modify the script to pass that variable to the test on i386.

content.raw: yes, not sure how to trade-off: funny looking brackets, big diff (from indenting the whole code), or using namespace; went with latter :)
content.html: yes, not sure how to trade-off: funny looking brackets, big diff (from indenting the whole code), or using namespace; went with latter :)

content.raw: looks fixed by e8e5ffb

content.raw: @\_jrivero_ can we build a prerelease of this branch to see if it works for 32-bit systems? I think that's the easiest way to test if this fixes the build on 32-bit systems.

content.raw: Add a comment that this final `}` is closing out the `namespace gazebo` block started at line 36 because it looks weird to have two `}` with the same indentation on adjacent lines.
content.html: Add a comment that this final } is closing out the namespace gazebo block started at line 36 because it looks weird to have two } with the same indentation on adjacent lines.
